def get_name_table(url): #spreadsheet,sheet="0"):
    # To Do: try the url before using it for the first time
    # url=get_url(spreadsheet,sheet)
    name=pd.read_csv(url, nrows=1,usecols=[1],header=None).values[0,0]
    df = pd.read_csv(url, skiprows=2)
    # validate df?
    return name,df

def timetxt2seg(txt,seg_dict):
    ttime=int(txt.split(":")[0])*60+int(txt.split(":")[1])
    seg_init=int(seg_dict["init_hr"]*60)
    # seg_end=int(seg_dict["end_hr"]*60)
    seg_step=int(seg_dict["step"])

    return (ttime-seg_init)//seg_step

def seg2timetxt(seg,seg_dict):
    seg_init=int(seg_dict["init_hr"]*60)
    seg_step=int(seg_dict["step"])

    ttime=seg*seg_step + seg_init

    hr= ttime//60
    hr_txt = "%02i"%hr

    min=ttime-hr*60
    min_txt="%02i"%min

    return hr_txt+":"+min_txt

def time2listseg(init_txt,end_txt,seg_dict):
    # init=int(init_txt.split(":")[0])*60+int(init_txt.split(":")[1])
    # end=int(end_txt.split(":")[0])*60+int(end_txt.split(":")[1])
    # seg_init=int(seg_dict["init_hr"]*60)
    # # seg_end=int(seg_dict["end_hr"]*60)
    # seg_step=int(seg_dict["step"])
    # print((init-seg_init)//seg_step)
    # print((end-seg_init)//seg_step)
    i_init=timetxt2seg(init_txt,seg_dict)
    i_end=timetxt2seg(end_txt,seg_dict)

    print("orig;",init_txt,end_txt,"\t new:",seg2timetxt(i_init,seg_dict),seg2timetxt(i_end,seg_dict))

    return range(i_init,i_end)

def load_table(df,url,seg_dict={"step":5,"init_hr":7.5,"end_hr":19}):

    name,df2add=get_name_table(url)

    for ind in df2add.index:
        print([df2add[key][ind] for key in df2add.columns.to_list()])
        lst_seg=time2listseg(df2add['Inicio'][ind],df2add['Fin'][ind],seg_dict)
        for seg in lst_seg:
            df.loc[len(df.index)] = [df2add['Día de la Semana'][ind],
                                     df2add['Curso'][ind],
                                     df2add['Sede'][ind],
                                     name,
                                     seg]

    df  

    # df.loc[len(df.index)] = ['Amy', 89, 93]  
seg_dict={"step":5,"init_hr":7.5,"end_hr":19}

def number_rows(filt_df,forced_limits={}):
    # filt_df: should had already filtered to show all data to be presented in the full table. In general should be the Sede and sometimes Curso 
    # forced limits is to forced table to start from some time, should include seg_dict inside
    imin=filt_df['Segmento'].min()
    imax=filt_df['Segmento'].max()
    return imax-imin
def number_cols_rep(filt_df):
    # filt_df: should had already filtered to show all data to be presented in the column. In general should be the day, Sede and sometimes Curso 
    ncol=1
    for iseg in filt_df['Segmento'].unique():
        ncol=max(ncol,len(filt_df[filt_df['Segmento']==iseg]))
    return ncol

def number_cols(filt_df,days=['Lunes','Martes','Miércoles','Jueves','Viernes']):
    # filt_df: should had already filtered to show all data to be presented in the full table. In general should be the Sede and sometimes Curso 
    res={}
    for day in days:
        ncol=number_cols_rep(filt_df[filt_df['DiaSemana']==day])
        res[day]=ncol
    return res

for sede in ['Rosario','Baigorria']:
    print(sede,number_rows(consultas[consultas['Sede']==sede]))
Rosario 26
Baigorria 7
for sede in ['Rosario','Baigorria']:
    print(sede,number_cols(consultas[consultas['Sede']==sede]))
Rosario {'Lunes': 1, 'Martes': 1, 'Miércoles': 2, 'Jueves': 1, 'Viernes': 1}
Baigorria {'Lunes': 1, 'Martes': 1, 'Miércoles': 1, 'Jueves': 1, 'Viernes': 1}

Test making list consultas

import pandas as pd
# https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UW4omimhSF5hGzVeiu_nnfSoFJap8V5f/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=107784684020414398234&rtpof=true&sd=true
id_spreadsheet="1hzk9-V7GxA1zexxdyIwBunavCc2EKIIy"
id_sheet=["1577060890","2021169522","11134517","863981205","665250288"]
def get_url(spreadsheet_id,sheet_id=None):
    if sheet_id is None:
        return "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/"+spreadsheet_id+"/export?format=csv"
    else:
        return "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/"+spreadsheet_id+"/export?format=csv&gid="+sheet_id
pd.read_csv(get_url(id_spreadsheet,id_sheet[0]), nrows=1,header=None).values
array([['Consultas', nan, nan]], dtype=object)

       ['M. E. Godino', 'lunes 26/02', '11'],
       ['M. E. Godino', 'martes 27/02', '11']], dtype=object)
def get_consultas(url):
    raw=pd.read_csv(url,header=None).values
    starttable=False
    consultas_rows=[]
    for i in range(len(raw)):
        # print(raw[i],len(raw[i]))
        if starttable:
            if pd.isnull(raw[i,0]):
                starttable=False
                consultas_rows[-1][1]=i-1

        if not isinstance(raw[i,0],str):
            continue
        if "física" in raw[i,0].lower() or "fisica" in raw[i,0].lower():
            curso=raw[i,0]
        if "examen" in raw[i,0].lower() or "fisica" in raw[i,0].lower():
            fechaExamen=raw[i,0].split()[-2:]
            fechaExamen=" ".join(fechaExamen)
            
        if raw[i,0]=="Docente":
            starttable=True
            consultas_rows.append([i,None])
            # if starttable:
            #     starttable=False
            #     consultas_rows[-1][1]=i-2
            # else:
            #     starttable=True
            #     consultas_rows.append([i,None])
    if starttable: # means last table was not restricted
        consultas_rows[-1][1]=len(raw)-2
    print(consultas_rows)
    res_df=[]
    for i in range(len(consultas_rows)):
        nrows=consultas_rows[i][1]-consultas_rows[i][0]
        skiprows=consultas_rows[i][0]
        aux=pd.read_csv(url,nrows=nrows,skiprows=skiprows)
        dict_col={col:col.strip() for col in aux.columns}
        aux=aux.rename(columns=dict_col)
        res_df.append(aux)
    df=pd.concat(res_df,ignore_index=True)

    # return [df,res_df], curso, fechaExamen
    return df, curso.strip(), fechaExamen
a1,a2,a3=get_consultas(get_url(id_spreadsheet,id_sheet[0]))

def convert_col_to_date(df,colname,new_colname="Fecha",add_year=None):
    if not add_year is None:
        print("Warning: Add year not yet implemented")
    daymonth=[el.strip().split()[-1] for el in df[colname].values]
    day=[int(el.split("/")[0]) for el in daymonth]
    month=[int(el.split("/")[1]) for el in daymonth]
    df.insert(len(df.columns),new_colname,daymonth,True)
    df['fecha']=pd.to_datetime(df[new_colname], format='%d/%m')
    return df
a1=convert_col_to_date(a1,'Día','Fecha')
